All in all, these investments are about creating jobs, growing small businesses, & keeping us competitive with the rest of the world. (13/x)

Plus, the reconciliation package includes significant tax cuts for working families largely through the Child Tax Credit. 

This middle class tax cut is putting money back in families pockets & will go a long way in keeping NJ affordable & reducing child poverty by 50%. (12/x)

The reconciliation package also builds on our efforts to boost our clean energy economy.

Whether it‚Äôs growing electric vehicle infrastructure, modernizing the grid, or expanding wind & solar - these investments are going to create good (often union!) jobs here at home. (11/x)

The investments there will help Americans reenter the workforce & gain the skills they need.

We need to make sure that we‚Äôre giving both businesses & working families the resources needed to create jobs & fuel our economic recovery. 

This package will do just that. (10/x)

Additionally, on small business walks all year, I‚Äôve heard about the challenges our businesses face in finding the workers needed to successfully reopen.

Reconciliation legislation will include crucial funding to expand child care access & workforce development programs. (9/x)

We need these investments to keep our communities competitive as we head into the future. (7/x)
